SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>Well... <sp:5:0:0>That was remarkable.<sp:5:0:0> You really
saved me.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Hello, are you hunting fireflies? This is the best
place to collect the sunset firefly you can find in
the evenings.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, sorry. I was whispering again,
wasn't I?

I'm in the habit of whispering to avoid
scaring off the fireflies.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>That's some impressive skill there!<sp:5:0:0> I'm
really amazed.<sp:5:0:0> Thank you for saving me!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Phew... <sp:5:0:0>My fireflies are safe.<sp:5:1:0> Thank you.
You really helped me out.
Com_Talk_30: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>How many do you want to buy?
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Wow, nice work!<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for the help.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Thank you! <sp:5:0:0>Because of you, the fireflies
are safe.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have anything you want to sell, just
let me know!
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm setting up shop in this beautiful place
where I met the fireflies.<sp:5:0:0> How about it?<sp:5:0:0>
Want to see my fireflies?
ShopGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>But enough about me. Is there anything
that you need? I carry quite a few things
that you may find useful.<sp:5:0:0>
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Ha! Well, look at that. I'm all sold out.<sp:5:0:0>
Feels great to have an empty inventory.
<sp:5:1:0>You're the best!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Buy something, would ya? <sp:5:0:0>Er, but I guess
I'd need stock for you to do that.

I'm all sold out of everything.<sp:5:0:0> Mind
coming back when I've restocked?<sp:0:4:0>In the meantime, you can check out what
I usually carry.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're calling on me in such ugly
weather, you must need something badly.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This part of Hyrule is known for its horses.


Highland Stable is just ahead of here. It's
an amazing inn where you can enjoy
horse racing.
People who come here have sometimes
seen a giant, white horse in the area.
Isn't that exciting?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Even if it's a detour, it's worth coming
here to see the sunset fireflies dancing
around in the forest at night.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>There seems to be an endless amount
here, so collecting them's easy. So long
as you keep quiet.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Farther down the road is the forest.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm happy to give you a ride in my wagon,
but do you want to see my wares first?
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Nothing quite like the sight of a
sunset firefly in the forest at night. If
you're catching them, be real quiet.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm surprised to meet anyone else here.<sp:5:1:0>
Are you looking for a place to sleep?

Highland Stable is just ahead of here. <sp:5:1:0>It's
an amazing inn where you can enjoy
horse racing.
Or maybe you're here looking for the
big, white horse people have seen in
the area?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm surprised to meet anyone else here.<sp:5:1:0>
But while I have you, have you seen any
strange woodland animals?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've spotted this mysterious creature in
the forest quite a few times.<sp:5:0:0> If you
approach it, it glows blue and darts off.
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Nope, nothing like the sunset firefly. <sp:5:1:0>This
is a whole different animal.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>I followed after it once and ended up in
some nasty ruins where I narrowly
averted death.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm heading down the road now to
the forest.

You can hop a lift on my wagon, if you
like. You'd catch a glimpse of some buggy
friends too.
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you. Anything else you want
to sell?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>♪Dum te dummmm...♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, sorry about that. <sp:5:0:0>I sing louder when
I feel like the rain might drown me out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>But if you're calling on me in such bad
weather, you must need something?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've seen some strange creatures in my
travels. I still don't know what that blue
thing I saw in the forest was.<sp:5:0:0>
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming_00>♪Hm hmm hmmm.♪


<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>You caught me humming the tune
I wrote—Frenetic Dance of the Firefly.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>The name's Eryck. I'm a free spirit who
travels where the wind blows me.<sp:5:1:0> Once
upon a time, anyway.
A while back, during one of my windswept
days, I got lost in a sea of trees. Starving,
I fell to the ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>When I regained consciousness...


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>I was in an otherworldly place!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:5000>...


<clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0000>Um... <sp:5:1:0>This is where you're supposed to gasp...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0800>A-anyway... <sp:5:1:0>The sight of the sunset firefly
dancing in the moonlight was so beautiful,
I thought I had landed in another world.
Before that night, I was a free spirit.
After? Enthralled by the firefly.
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I see.<sp:5:0:0> Well, I won't force you to sell.
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0701>I'll buy just about anything from you.
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0101>This is a thank-you.<sp:5:0:0> Go ahead and take it.
ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Before I get too distracted, <sp:5:0:0>why not have
a look at my firefly friends again?
Com_Talk_07: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. We're all out of that.
ShopGoodBye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure, no problem. Just let me know
whenever you need something.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This area is the natural habitat of the
sunset firefly. It's my absolute
favorite place.
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:QuestionNormal>Your pouch is full. Come back when
you've got room.
Com_Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>One of my finest! I hope you like it.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0701>So how many will you sell me?
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh, so sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I can't buy that.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey now.<sp:5:0:0> You're trying to sell me the
clothes right off your back?<sp:5:0:0> At least take
them off before you try to sell them to me.
GoRange_01b:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Shhh... <sp:5:0:0>Use your inside voice...<sp:0:4:0>Just look at the sunset fireflies glittering across the
forest.<sp:5:0:0> Otherworldly, isn't it?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>There's so many here that it's easy to collect them.
So long as you're quiet.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>♪Hm hm hmmm.♪


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Heh. <sp:5:0:0>I may be a merchant, but I know
what sells and what doesn't. Can't say my
singing could make me any money.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When the weather's bad, there's nothing
like some rare goods to lift the spirits.
I found these in a cave.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>♪Hmmm hm hmmm.♪


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh, you caught me humming.<sp:5:0:0> It's a good
way to keep from feeling lonely out on the
road, just humming away to myself.
Com_Talk_11_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Great product, no? I'm sure you'll make
good use of it.
